TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProcessInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关当前正在执行的进程的信息。

span.span: Provides information on processes currently executing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类返回有关在 ASP.NET 进程模型下运行的 ASP.NET 工作进程的信息。This class returns information about ASP.NET worker processes that are running under the ASP.NET process model. 静态方法和返回此类型的对象 。Objects of this type are returned by the static methods and . 这些方法是创建已初始化对象的唯一有用方法。These methods are the only useful ways to create an initialized object. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用的是 Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0，则 只有在 iis 5.0 隔离模式下运行时，才可以使用类返回的进程指标。If you are using Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0, process metrics returned by the classes are available only if you are running in IIS 5.0 isolation mode. 如果在工作进程隔离模式下使用 IIS 6.0，则将禁用 ASP.NET 进程模型，并 在访问成员时引发异常 。If you are using IIS 6.0 in worker process isolation mode, the ASP.NET process model is disabled and an exception is thrown when you access members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类的、、、、 和 属性 。The following code example demonstrates using the , , , , , and properties of the class. 该示例显示 。The example displays a . 当 单击时，将显示当前进程的信息。When the is clicked, the current process information is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[ProcessInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ProcessInfo/CS/processinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ProcessInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ProcessInfo/VB/processinfovb.aspx#1)]
